title: Celebrating Ramadan
description: Ramadan is an important holiday for Muslims around the world. Celebrating Ramadan provides students a comprehensive look at the different aspects of this holiday, including when, where,  and how it is celebrated. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine the main idea and details of a text as well as identify commas in a series.
meta: crescent moon, fast, new moon, praying, religion
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Determine the main idea and details in a text
Commas : Recognize and use commas in a series
Homographs : Identify and use homographs in sentences

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
